original_solution_mapping.L1: The last 3 students had an average completion time of 35 seconds so the sum of their completion times was 3*35 = <<3*35=105>>105 seconds
original_solution_mapping.L2: All 4 students (now including the student who came first) had an average completion time of 30 seconds, meaning the sum of their completion times is 4*30 = <<4*30=120>>120 seconds
original_solution_mapping.L3: The student who came first spent 120-105 = <<120-105=15>>15 seconds in the race

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3710.
    Returns: the time (in seconds) it took the student who came first to finish the race.
    """
    # L1
    num_last_three_students = 3 # last three students
    avg_time_last_three = 35 # 35 seconds
    sum_time_last_three = num_last_three_students * avg_time_last_three

    # L2
    total_students = 4 # All 4 students
    avg_time_all_four = 30 # 30 seconds
    sum_time_all_four = total_students * avg_time_all_four

    # L3
    first_student_time = sum_time_all_four - sum_time_last_three

    # FA
    answer = first_student_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The last {num_last_three_students} students had an average completion time of {avg_time_last_three} seconds so the sum of their completion times was {num_last_three_students}*{avg_time_last_three} = <<{num_last_three_students}*{avg_time_last_three}={sum_time_last_three}>>{sum_time_last_three} seconds

All {total_students} students (now including the student who came first) had an average completion time of {avg_time_all_four} seconds, meaning the sum of their completion times is {total_students}*{avg_time_all_four} = <<{total_students}*{avg_time_all_four}={sum_time_all_four}>>{sum_time_all_four} seconds
The student who came first spent {sum_time_all_four}-{sum_time_last_three} = <<{sum_time_all_four}-{sum_time_last_three}={first_student_time}>>{first_student_time} seconds in the race

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The last 3 students had an average completion time of 3 seconds so the sum of their completion times was 3*3 = <<3*3=9>>9 seconds
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: All 4 students (now including the student who came first) had an average completion time of 30 seconds, meaning the sum of their completion times is 4*30 = <<4*30=120>>120 seconds
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: The student who came first spent 120-9 = <<120-9=111>>111 seconds in the race

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_last_three_students' (3) was used instead of 'avg_time_last_three' (35).
